articles.description: The Zero 30 5G smartphone available in 256GB+12GB (Up to 21GB) or 256GB+8GB (Up to 16GB) variants priced at Rs 22,999 and Rs 21,999
articles.content: Hyderabad: Infinix, a smartphone brand, has launched Infinix Zero 30 5G smartphone. Designed for creators, the Zero 30 5G provides users with an exceptional camera quality, superior performance as we… [+6522 chars]
